scripts.build: browserify src/main.js -t babelify --presets [es2015] > build/main.js && npm run build-three
scripts.build-uglify: rollup -c three/rollup.config.js && uglifyjs build/three.js -cm --preamble "// threejs.org/license" > build/three.min.js
scripts.build-closure: rollup -c three/rollup.config.js && java -jar utils/build/compiler/closure-compiler-v20160713.jar --warning_level=VERBOSE --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --externs utils/build/externs.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --js build/three.js --js_output_file build/three.min.js
